attributes.action: Please make killing, caging and exploiting sentient organisms illegal.
attributes.additional_details: All sentient organisms want to avoid suffering and death. So, we should make killing, caging and exploiting sentient organisms illegal.
attributes.background: Please make killing, caging and exploiting sentient organisms illegal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like covered by "exploiting".  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
